mapper.sql: a.orgid, c.orgname, b.name as sname, a.sid, a.id, a.plan_id, a.amount, a.discount, a.state, a.parentid, date_format(a.confirm_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as confirm_date, date_format(a.pay_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as pay_date, date_format(a.repay_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as repay_date, d.name as planname, d.type, d.charge_type, d.payday, d.plan_date, d.state as p_state, d.deadline, d.bill_month, d.price_detail
mapper.select: select distinct t.orgid, t.orgname from student s, clazz c, orginfo t where s.cid = c.cid and c.orgid = t.orgid and s.p_custno = #{custno,jdbctype=varchar}
SELECT S.SID , S.NAME AS sname, C.CID , C.NAME AS cname FROM STUDENT S, CLAZZ C WHERE S.CID = C.CID AND C.ORGID = #{orgid,JDBCTYPE=VARCHAR} AND S.P_CUSTNO = #{custno,JDBCTYPE=VARCHAR}
select orgid from org_plan_detail where id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select b.pay_date from org_plan a,org_plan_detail b where a.id=b.plan_id and b.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
